transcript:
Customer: This call is now being recorded.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji Ravi ji Shahnawaz bol raha tha Ravi ji yahi number hai mera.
Executive: Ji ji isko save kar lijiyega Ravi ji theek hai.
Customer: Aur baki ab aage se sir koi dikkat nahi aayegi.
Executive: Suniye na thoda sun lijiye na.
Customer: Ji ji.
Customer: Ye ek aur number hai.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Dusra wala jo number hai na second number.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Haan us pe aap call kar lijiye na thoda.
Executive: Okay okay theek hai main dekhiye dusra dusra ek to number hai usko ji kar lijiye hum isko bhi save kar lete hai.
Customer: Theek hai isko kar lijiye.
Executive: Theek hai sir theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to provide another number.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to save both numbers.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- contact number, save number, call
